vossen_en_konijnen.model.actor

Class Lynx

  • java.lang.Object
    • vossen_en_konijnen.model.actor.Animal
      • vossen_en_konijnen.model.actor.Lynx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Lynx
extends Animal
    A simple model of a lynx. Lynxes age, move, eat rabbits and lynxes, and die.
    Version:
    2011.07.31
    Author:
    David J. Barnes, Michael KÃ¶lling, Ronald Scholten,

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lynx

        public Lynx(boolean randomAge,
            Field field,
            Location location,
            boolean gender)
        Create a lynx. A lynx can be created as a new born (age zero and not hungry) or with a random age and food level.
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the lynx will have random age and hunger level.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.
        gender - The gender of a lynx

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(java.util.List<Actor> newLynxes)
        This is what the lynx does most of the time: it hunts for rabbits. In the process, it might breed, die of hunger, or die of old age.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Actor
        Specified by:
        act in class Animal
        Parameters:
        newLynxes - A list to return newly born lynxes.

      • findFood

        private Location findFood()
        Look for rabbits adjacent to the current location. Only the first live rabbit is eaten.
        Returns:
        Where food was found, or null if it wasn't.
